content: Shinhan-flow의 액션들을 나열할게 잔액 : { "type":"balanceNotificationAction", "account":"123-123-123456" }, 환전 : { "type":"exchangeAction", "currency":"USD", "fromAccount":"123-123-123456", "amount":0 }, 환율 알림 : { "type":"exchangeRateNotificationAction", "currency":"USD" }, text 알림 : { "type":"textNotificationAction", "text":"얼른 운동가자" }, 송금 : { "type":"transferAction", "fromAccount":"123-123-123456", "toAccount":"456-456-456789", "amount":0 }
